chara.textHome: Happy Sweet and Sour Year!
And I mapo doufu you have a great one!
*Giggle*

I tried to mix our menu into
my New Year's tidings!
Gooooood morning!

So cold this early... It's nice to warm up
with some ramen soup, but we should
jump rope for a REAL warm up!
One hour, let's go!
You gotta keep your eye on the enemy!

That's why I'm gonna buy some
okonomiyaki at the restaurant next door!
Homph, om nom... Mm...
it's...good...!
Whoa?! The sun's already set.

Well, playing outside is done,
time to put away the equipment!

And then...over to Mikazuki Villa
for MORE fun!
When's the first dream of the year?

The one you wake up from on
New Year's Day? Or the day after?

Well... I slept so hard I don't remember,
anyway. Ha ha...
Mm... Okay, all done!

Winter break homework stands as much
chance against mighty ol' me as a
stick of dried squid! Ha ha ha!

I, the Mightiest Tsuruno Yui, will
NEVER let you get away with
threatening Kamihama's peace!

Especially not during
New Year's celebrations!
Come at me!

Do you think the copies over in
Endless Mirrors have vacation
during New Year's too?!
We should go check it out!

I can't wait to try my 
"New Year's Chinese Rice Cake"!

I made it for the first time this year,
so haven't tried any of it...
Bet it's good, though!
We fried it in sesame oil!

I hope my New Year's Chinese
spread will grant my wish...

"I hope this year glistens like the oil
we simmer fried rice in"!

Phew... I've been hard at work since
the New Year started!

I've been teaching Sana and Felicia
how to spin tops, Tsuruno-style!
Those two are turning into some great pupils!

You can do Tsuruno Exercises
even with a long-sleeved kimono!

Twiiist your body to the right! Twist! Twist!
Now to the left! Stretch those hips!
Mngh?! My Tsuruno sense is tingling...!
This smell, it's...
New Year's sweets!
And the source...it's gotta be Mikazuki Villa.
We have to get going!

I got a picture taken with Iroha
and Master in their kimonos!

Master looks so grown up...
we look like we could all be sisters, here!

Aaah, so warm... Nothing beats a
nice heated table in the winter.

Though you gotta train,
even while you relax!

That's why I've been working
on my grip strength!
How do I look in my kimono?
Does it suit me?
Wait, really?!

I never thought you'd give me
a compliment, I'm so embarrassed now!
Da♪dabadabadaaa♪

Hm? Oh, this?
I'm practicing some New Year's music!

I don't have any traditional instruments,
so I'm just doing it a cappella!
